explain: Usain Bolt, the famous Jamaican sprinter, has officially joined the Jamaican team for the IAAF/BTC World Relays in the Bahamas, as announced by the Jamaica Athletics Administrative Association.
Usain Bolt, a six-time Olympic gold medallist, will be part of the Jamaican relay team competing in the IAAF/BTC World Relays in the Bahamas from May 2-3.
